text: "No Regrets" is a 1983 song by French singer Amanda Lear and taken from her sixth studio album Tam-Tam. It did not chart in France and Italy. == Track listing == *7" Single :A. "No Regrets" – 4:26 :B. "It's All Over" – 3:35 *12" Single :A. "No Regrets" (Extended Vocal Version) – 5:50 :B. "No Regrets" (Instrumental Dub) – 5:23 == References == Category:1983 songs Category:Pop songs Category:Amanda Lear songs
title: No Regrets (Amanda Lear song)
